awuruddak pasama uthuru amarikawe maha manthrana sabhawa mangin tharangayak sanwidhanaya karanu labanawa.me sandaha sahabhagi kara ganne ek palathakinma tharuna gahanu lamayaku ha pirimi lamayeku pamanayi.me sandaha disthrik 12k tharanga wadinawa.mehi athi unusum tharangakarithwaya nisama mema tharangaya sajiwiwa ratawasiyan siyallata narambaiya haki ayurin sanwidhanaya karanu labanawa.thawada mema tharangayata idiripathwana tharangakaruwan thamange prathiwadin parajaya kota awasan mohotha dakwama tharangawadiya yuthuya.ese kirimata apohosath wuwahoth owunta thama jiwithayen eeta wandi gewimata siduwanawa.
